title: Why is the Back ground for most played character Karthus when I main Sion?

replies.body: I believe that the background is intended to show the most recently played champion.  This is a testing period, so you may see some issues.  I recommend reporting this over at the [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards for the client devs.  Thanks for the report!
